package deal.translation[0].definitions[: a holiday organized by a company at a fixed price that includes the cost of travel, hotel etc
a cheap package deal to Tenerife
an offer or agreement which includes several things that you must buy or accept together
The Commission attempted to bring all three proposals into one package deal.
package deal.translation[1].definitions[: an offer or agreement that includes several things that must all be accepted together
The cable provider is to sign up five global advertisers for the package deal.
